+ "\n" + "DEADLINE -- Adds a task with a deadline. "

+ "Type 'done' & a task number to complete that specific task."
+ "Type 'delete' & a task number to delete that task."
+ "\n" + "LIST -- If you want to view what's on your tasklist, key in 'list'."
